Accelerators,

Here is our October newsletter (https://psysciacc.org/news/2019-10-17_news-from-the-accelerator-october-2019.html) with updates on study selection, all 6 current studies, a new PSA press team, and a policy vote. Members, please vote on the Analysis Plan Approval Policy (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DtoIMZoi3-a4nmgvQbV0LsbEH2xNMgRNnS94H6Jx3jo/edit#heading=h.x22gltabenuo) by replying "yes" or "no" to this email. Remember, you can become an official PSA member (or update your status and info) by creating a login at our new membership site (https://member.psysciacc.org/). Thanks, all!
